title: Replace SolviroStudio logo site-wide with uploaded logo

requirements.text: Add the user-uploaded logo image ("ChatGPT Image Feb 10, 2026, 06_11_32 AM.png") to the app’s static assets and create optimized logo variants for web use (navigation/header and favicon), keeping the logo visually crisp on light and dark backgrounds.
acceptanceCriteria: The repository contains the original uploaded logo file stored under frontend/public/assets/generated (or a clearly documented assets folder under frontend/public) without routing through the backend.
At least two optimized variants exist in frontend/public/assets/generated: one for header/nav display and one square icon suitable for favicon/app icon usage.
The optimized logo variants have transparent background (where applicable) and look sharp when rendered at typical navbar sizes (e.g., ~28–40px tall) and at favicon sizes.

requirements.text: Replace all current text-only “SolviroStudio” branding in the site header/navigation and footer with the new logo image, while keeping accessible text via alt attributes and maintaining consistent spacing/alignment with the existing layout.
acceptanceCriteria: Top navigation (frontend/src/components/TopNav.tsx) displays the new logo image instead of the text “SolviroStudio”.
Footer (frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx) displays the new logo image instead of the text “SolviroStudio”.
All logo images include meaningful alt text (e.g., “SolviroStudio logo”) and do not cause layout shifts when scrolling (TopNav scroll state remains stable).
The logo scales responsively and remains legible on both transparent (top-of-page) and scrolled (bg-background/95) nav states.

requirements.text: Update the HTML document head metadata to use the new favicon derived from the uploaded logo.
acceptanceCriteria: frontend/index.html references a favicon file derived from the uploaded logo (e.g., /assets/generated/solvirostudio-favicon...).
The favicon loads correctly in the browser tab when running the app.

constraints: Frontend immutable paths must not be edited: frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.ts, frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.tsx, frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts, frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/components/ui.
Do not route images through the backend; serve logo assets as static files from the frontend (consistent with existing static asset handling).
Backend architecture must remain single-actor; no backend changes are required for this request.
nonGoals: Changing brand colors (#FFD233, #FFA500, #FF6A00) or the global visual system.
Redesigning the site layout beyond necessary adjustments to fit the new logo in the header/footer.
Adding new pages, sections, or backend features.

required: Transparent-background header logo derived from the uploaded logo (solvirostudio-logo-header.dim_800x240.png)
Square icon derived from the uploaded logo for favicon/app icon usage (solvirostudio-favicon.dim_256x256.png)
